odd.head: Series Statement

odd.head: Date/Time and Place of Event
odd.p: Recorded live in 1968 at Canterbury House, Ann Arbor, Mich.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: On the way home -- Mr. Soul -- Expecting to fly -- The last trip to Tulsa -- The loner -- Birds -- Winterlong (excerpt) -- Out of my mind -- If I could have her tonight -- Sugar mountain -- I've been waiting for you -- Nowadays Clancy can't even sing -- The old laughing lady -- Broken arrow.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: DVD: On the way home -- Mr. Soul -- Expecting to fly -- The last trip to Tulsa -- The loner -- Birds -- Winterlong (excerpt) -- Out of my mind -- If I could have her tonight -- Sugar mountain -- I've been waiting for you -- Nowadays Clancy can't even sing -- The old laughing lady -- Broken arrow -- Neil Young archives vol. 1 trailer.
